docs.snippet: Unlike other countries like England, Spain, France and Germany, Italy has only one top-division men’s club, Fiorentina, that operates a women’s team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Unlike other countries like England, Spain, France and Germany, Italy has only one top-division men’s club, Fiorentina, that operates a women’s team.
docs.abstract: Italian soccer league has been failing to keep up with other countries in Europe that support and invest in professional women's soccer; Fiorentina is only women's club in Italy that competes in top division, while other countries support multiple clubs; efforts to change face many challenges, not least of which is lack of funding.

headline.main: In Italy, a Top Club Stands Alone in Supporting Women’s Soccer
